section.heading: Rules.
section.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter.
section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 21-242: § 4 of D.C. Law 21-242 provided that the creation of this section by § 3(c) of D.C. Law 21-242 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore the change made to this section by that amendment has been delayed.
